instruction: Generate a creative poem based on the keyword "friendship".
output:
Friends are a precious kind of joy, 
That can fill your day with delight,
Bringing peace, o'er worries, 
Forever shining a light.

Friendship is the fondest thing,
This life can ever bring,
A loyal bond that never wavers, 
Giving us the courage to dream.

A friend is there whenever you need,
Bringing love and understanding,
Sharing joy and happiness,
In the mists of life blooming.

Friendship is what makes life worth living,
An emotion that is ours to share,
So that when life will have its dark days,
At least we'll still have laughter and care!
